TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Projekt II vedrørende fast affald i Khorog (TJ-Khorog)

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Subsidiary State Unitary Enterprise (SSUE) «Khojagii Manziliyu Kommunali»
ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , Republic of TAJIKISTAN, postal code: 736000, Tel: (

OLD.P: To be qualified for the award of a contract, tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:
— The tenderer shall have an average annual turnover calculated as total certified payments received for contracts in progress or completed, within 2015-2017 years in amount of:

— The tenderer must demonstrate access to, or availability of, financial resources such as liquid assets, unencumbered real assets, lines of credit, and other financial means, other than any contractual advance payments to meet:
(ii) the overall cash flow requirements for this contract and its current commitments.

— Experience as supplier, in at least 2 (two) contracts that have been successfully and substantially completed and that are similar to the proposed goods within 2013-2017 years, each with a value of at least:
— Joint ventures, consortiums or associations (JVCA) shall meet the following minimum qualification requirements:
—— the lead partner shall demonstrate at least 1 contact per lot successfully executed,
—— all partners shall be jointly and severally liable,

—— JVCA representative shall have the original of power of attorney as authority to conduct all business for and on behalf of any and all the partners of the joint venture /consortium during tender process and, in the event of the contract, during contract execution.

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before 14:00 (local time), 7.5.2018 at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend:

NEW.P: Closing date: 17.5.2018, 15:00 local time
To be qualified for the award of a contract, tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:

— the tenderer must demonstrate access to, or availability of, financial resources such as free funds on current account, lines of credit dedicated to this project execution, or other similarly highly liquid financial means, in the amount not less than 90 % of the tender price per each lot to which the tenderer applies. The tenderer must demonstrate that the funds required for this project are free of its other commitments or sufficient to cover the overall cash flow requirements for this contract and its current commitments. Alternatively, if the payment arrangements with a manufacture provide for less financing necessary from the supplier, the respective agreement shall be provided as an evidence of the sufficiency of funding,

— the tenderer should submit the audited balance sheets, or if not required by the law of the tenderer's country, other financial statements acceptable to the Purchaser, for the 2015-2017 years to demonstrate the current soundness of the tenderer's financial position and its prospective long-term profitability,
— tenderer must demonstrate that the offered type of goods have been in the successful production and operation under similar conditions for at least last 3 (three) years, i.e. 2015-2017,

— tenderer must demonstrate that they have experience as supplier of the suggested by them or similar goods over the last 3 years, i.e. 2015-2017, under the contract(s) that have been successfully and substantially completed. The similarity shall be based on the functions of machinery, complexity, methods /technology or other characteristics as described in Section VI, supply requirements,
— Joint ventures, consortiums or associations (JVCA) shall meet the following minimum qualification requirements:
—— the lead partner shall demonstrate experience as the supplier of the offered goods under the contract(s) already successfully executed,
—— all partners shall be jointly and severally liable,

—— JVCA representative shall have the original of power of attorney as authority to conduct all business for and on behalf of any and all the partners of the joint venture /consortium during tender process and, in the event of the contract, during contract execution.
Tenderers shall also meet other criteria as specified in the tender documents.

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before 15:00 (local time), 17.5.2018 at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend:
E-mail: kdf.khmk@mail.ru

The tenderer must demonstrate that the funds required for this project are free of its other commitments or sufficient to cover the overall cash flow requirements for this contract and its current commitments. Alternatively, if the payment arrangements with a manufacture provide for less financing necessary from the supplier, the respective agreement shall be provided as an evidence of the sufficiency of funding,

— the tenderer should submit the audited balance sheets, or if not required by the law of the tenderer's country, other financial statements acceptable to the Purchaser, for the 2015-2017 years to demonstrate the current soundness of the tenderer's financial position and its prospective long-term profitability,
— tenderer must demonstrate that the offered type of goods have been in the successful production and operation under similar conditions for at least last 3 (three) years, i.e. 2015-2017,

— tenderer must demonstrate that they have experience as supplier of the suggested by them or similar goods over the last 3 years, i.e. 2015-2017, under the contract(s) that have been successfully and substantially completed. The similarity shall be based on the functions of machinery, complexity, methods /technology or other characteristics as described in Section VI, supply requirements,
— Joint ventures, consortiums or associations (JVCA) shall meet the following minimum qualification requirements:
—— the lead partner shall demonstrate experience as the supplier of the offered goods under the contract(s) already successfully executed,
—— all partners shall be jointly and severally liable,

—— JVCA representative shall have the original of power of attorney as authority to conduct all business for and on behalf of any and all the partners of the joint venture /consortium during tender process and, in the event of the contract, during contract execution.
Tenderers shall also meet other criteria as specified in the tender documents.

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before 15:00 (local time), 17.5.2018 at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend:

— the tenderer must demonstrate access to, or availability of, financial resources such as free funds on current account, lines of credit dedicated to this project execution, or other similarly highly liquid financial means, in the amount not less than 90 % of the tender price per each lot to which the tenderer applies. The tenderer must demonstrate that the funds required for this project are free of its other commitments or sufficient to cover the overall cash flow requirements for this contract and its current commitments. Alternatively, if the payment arrangements with a manufacture provide for less financing necessary from the supplier, the respective agreement shall be provided as an evidence of the sufficiency of funding,

— the tenderer should submit the audited balance sheets, or if not required by the law of the tenderer's country, other financial statements acceptable to the Purchaser, for the 2015-2017 years to demonstrate the current soundness of the tenderer's financial position and its prospective long-term profitability,
— tenderer must demonstrate that the offered type of goods have been in the successful production and operation under similar conditions for at least last 3 (three) years, i.e. 2015-2017,

— tenderer must demonstrate that they have experience as supplier of the suggested by them or similar goods over the last 3 years, i.e. 2015-2017, under the contract(s) that have been successfully and substantially completed. The similarity shall be based on the functions of machinery, complexity, methods /technology or other characteristics as described in Section VI, supply requirements,
— Joint ventures, consortiums or associations (JVCA) shall meet the following minimum qualification requirements:
—— the lead partner shall demonstrate experience as the supplier of the offered goods under the contract(s) already successfully executed,
—— all partners shall be jointly and severally liable,

—— JVCA representative shall have the original of power of attorney as authority to conduct all business for and on behalf of any and all the partners of the joint venture /consortium during tender process and, in the event of the contract, during contract execution.
Tenderers shall also meet other criteria as specified in the tender documents.

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before 15:00 (local time), 17.5.2018 at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend:
E-mail: kdf.khmk@mail.ru
